title: Hextech Key Fragment stop dropping
body: So i know that when u earn a lot of key fragment the drop rate will go lower til it reset sometime later but the thing is i got about 5 key fragment and i stop dropping at all even when i play with 3 of my friend and win games. it had been nearly 3 weeks since it stop dropping. Is it a bug or something or is it just im not ucky enough to get any key(even when i got **S+**)

replies.body:
The droprate for key fragments drops exponentially with each fragment you earn. This droprate resets approximately 30 days after you earned the first fragment. If you're still not seeing fragments drop after a bit more time has passed and your droprate resets, let me know.

For a bit more detail about Hextech Key Fragments, check out [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
